mapper.insert: insert into user (id, avatar, captcha, description, email, encrypt, is_online, lastloginip, lastlogintime, password, phone, real_name, regtime, save, username, wechat, wechat_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{captcha,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOnline,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{save,jdbcType=BIT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, captcha = #{captcha,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encrypt = #{encrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_online = #{isOnline,jdbcType=BIT}, lastloginip = #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regtime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, save = #{save,jdbcType=BIT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_name = #{wechatName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, avatar, captcha, description, email, encrypt, is_online, lastloginip, lastlogintime, password, phone, real_name, regtime, save, username, wechat, wechat_name from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
